snippet: CVS deserves a big round of applause for deciding to end the sale of cigarettes and other tobacco products at its stores.
abstract: Editorial praises drugstore chain CVS Caremark for deciding to phase out the sale of cigarettes and other tobacco products; urges Congress to explore possible legislation prohibiting tobacco sales in all pharmacies if the other big drugstore chains do not follow the lead of CVS.
lead_paragraph: CVS deserves a big round of applause for deciding to end the sale of cigarettes and other tobacco products at its stores.
